title: MAG 156 - Reflection Transcript
text:
hale, then exhales.) 

The Magnus Archives – 156 – Reflection 
PETER 
How does that make you feel? 
[The static in the background adopts a bit more bass than usual, and the 
high-pitched scream-like tones increase in volume as well.] 
MARTIN 
Nothing. (Short laugh) Nothing at all. 
PETER 
Excellent. I’m so proud of you, Martin. 
MARTIN 
I really don’t care. 
PETER 
Perfect. 
[Tape clicks off.] 
[The Magnus Archives Theme – Outro] 
JONATHAN SIMS
